name: Elite Griffin Medal
medal_obtain: Awarded to Commanders who complete all battle challenges during a major limited-time event.

name: Combat Ranking Medal
medal_obtain: Awarded to Commanders who achieve outstanding results during a Theater-scale major combat event.

name: Collection Ranking Medal
medal_obtain: Awarded to Commanders who achieve outstanding results in Doll and furniture collection.

name: Challenger Medal
medal_obtain: Awarded to Commanders who achieve extraordinary results during a carnival event.

name: Elite Adventurer Medal
medal_obtain: Awarded to Commanders who complete all battle challenges during a limited-time collaboration event.

name: Sangvis-Griffin Coalition Medal
medal_obtain: Awarded to Commanders who achieve exceptional results with Coalition Units during a major limited-time event.

name: Chess Champion Medal
medal_obtain: Awarded to Commanders who achieve extraordinary results in Luffberry Chess.

name: 8th Theater Pioneer Medal
medal_obtain: Awarded to Commanders who achieved an outstanding score in the 8th Theater Event.

name: 8th Theater Conqueror Medal
medal_obtain: Awarded to Commanders who delivered exceptional performance in the final stage of the 8th Theater Event.
